title: Crazy Ping Spikes Patch 6.17
body: Lately ever since this patch i have been having insane ping spikes during any kind of activity in a game. My ping will go from 57 to 100-300 and spike around i have Centurylink as a internet provider if that makes a difference but please help resolve this problem i have done just about everything i can think of=/

replies.body: Random lag spikes like this can result from network issues like packet loss, and it could be due to your ISP's routing.  To find out what's going on for sure, I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of your situation.  The results should also provide a list of steps to help get this fixed up for you.  Let me know if you have any questions!
